SEARCH
Package com.example.app

Class MenuController.MenuItem

java.lang.Object
com.example.app.MenuController.MenuItem
Enclosing class:
MenuController
public static class MenuController.MenuItem extends Object
Represents a menu item record with attributes for ID, name, category, and price.

  • Constructor Details

    • MenuItem

      public MenuItem(int menuId, String name, double price, String category)
      Constructs a new MenuItem instance.
      Parameters:
      menuId - the unique menu item identifier
      name - the item's display name
      price - the base price of the item
      category - the category (e.g., "milk tea", "fruit tea", "seasonal")
